FuncDef: The display upgrade rollback command displays information about whether the rollback function is enabled in the current version.
Examples: Info:The state of upgrade rollback is enable. Limit time is 20 minutes.
Info:The state of upgrade rollback is disable.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If an error occurs during an upgrade (for example, the new startup files are damaged), cancel the current upgrade and restore the previous version used before the upgrade. To view information about whether the rollback function is enabled in the current version, run the display upgrade rollback command.
